mdRecord.dcterms:title: Surgical stitcher
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: VIM-Ogburn [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Handwritten inside case: "Dr. Herbert C. Chase, 40 East 61st Street, New York". Kit inludes: instructions, information booklet, stitcher, stitcher bobbins, stitcher knife, needles, gauze.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Surgical instruments and apparatus
